sentences.en: Detection is not properly a function of the customs service.
sentences.cn: 严格地说来,侦查工作不是海关的一项职责.

sentences.en: Early detection of the disease is vital.
sentences.cn: 这种病关键在于及早发现。

sentences.en: Fire detection technology is the combination of detector technology and fire detection algorithm.
sentences.cn: 火灾探测技术是传感技术和火灾探测算法的结合产物。

sentences.en: From 1942 onward I worked on the first anti - midget - submarine detection systems.
sentences.cn: 从1942年往后,我研究了头一批 反 小型潜艇的探测系统.

sentences.en: He tried to escape detection by disguising himself as an old man.
sentences.cn: 他企图乔装一老人逃过侦察者的耳目.

sentences.en: It is difficult to define the detection limits obtained by chelation - solvent extraction.
sentences.cn: 确定螯合 -- 溶剂萃取法所得到的检测限颇为困难.

sentences.en: Nose is a remarkable sensitive detection device.
sentences.cn: 鼻子是一种非常灵敏的探测器官.

sentences.en: Organic scintillators are not satisfactory for the detection of heavy particles.
sentences.cn: 有机闪烁体不太适合于探测重粒子.

sentences.en: Such cases casually appear normal and probably escape detection.
sentences.cn: 这样的病例偶尔表现正常,并可能被忽略.

sentences.en: The change was too obvious to escape detection.
sentences.cn: 变化太明显了,逃不过她的眼睛.

sentences.en: The detection rate for motor vehicle theft that year was just 11.7 per cent.
sentences.cn: 那一年机动车盗窃案的侦破率仅为11.7%。

sentences.en: The detection rate for racial crimes is appallingly low.
sentences.cn: 种族罪案的侦破率之低让人震惊。

sentences.en: The gasoline detection system consists of a capillary restriction.
sentences.cn: 汽油检测系统由毛细管节流器组成.

sentences.en: The most important deterrent for most criminals is the likelihood of detection and arrest.
sentences.cn: 对大多数罪犯来说，最大的威慑力量是警方可能会破案并将他们逮捕。

sentences.en: These large populations facilitate the detection of rare mutational or recombinational events.
sentences.cn: 这样的大群体有利于检出稀有的突变或重组子.

sentences.en: This trick escaped detection at the time.
sentences.cn: 这骗局那时候没被发觉.

phrases.tran_cn: 探测电路，传感电路，检测电路；检波器
火灾探测；火警探测；火警侦察器
目标检测；目标探测；目标觉察

trans.tran_en: when something is found that is not easy to see, hear etc, or the process of looking for it
